title: >>> Return to TRADITION
body_text:
Only one word can send DODGEBALL 50 into immortality: "tradition".
--->
OCEAN ROAD PARK
The renown, yet almost hidden ground of Ocean Road Park is set to host the 50th installment of what was first viewed as a "local phenomenon". Ocean Road Park is the birthplace of the very sport expierenced weekly since early September 2005. Some 11 months, 49 events, and 180 players later, the journey reaches its true climax, crashing into the basketball courts that provided months and months of memories.
Quick Facts about ORP
I. Hosted events 1-15, 30, 35, 38, 42, and 43.
II. To this day, holds the record for the highest number of male players at a single event: 36 at DODGEBALL XTWO.
III. Saw the birth and death of Joe Kelly's monumental captains run.
--->
THE MUSIC
All previous "ten" events have been accompanied with a special commemorative song ...
- Popular musical group
Staind
provided their hit "Mudshovel" for the original "ten" event, DODGEBALL X.
- Often referred to as
The ClimaXX
, DODGEBALL 20 hit the jackpot with "Hey Man, Nice Shot" by
Filter
.
- The return to Ocean Road Park at DODGEBALL 30 heard "Right Now" by the legendary band
Van Halen
.
- The DODGEBALL XL theme song had a little "octane" to it with
Metallica's
"Fuel".
There are thousands upon thousands of songs that would make for great DODGEBALL 50 themes. Don't expect just one song to be the official theme. There will be more on this story in the final week leading to DODGEBALL 50.
--->
THE PAGEANTRY
Whether it's the multi-colored streamers or dangling Christmas lights, always expect an additional shine to the "ten" events. If all goes well, the atmosphere at DODGEBALL 50 as a whole will surpass any previous event.
--->
AWARDS
Before the action even begins, one can always expect the "Dodgeball Excellence Awards". There have been a mix of awards ranging from the classics like "Powerhouse Thrower" and "Most Intense", to the more comedic "Allied Powers" and "Best Dressed". Either way, the awards portion of past "ten" events have always added a little something to each event.
This time around, although currently unofficial, there will be an award category entitled "The Forgotten Awards". Catch DODGEBALL 50 live to see what these are all about.
--->
PICTURES AND VIDEO
As good as the mental pictures may be, cameras have allowed for everyone to get a glimpse of the action. Dating from DODGEBALL 8, still pictures have become almost routine at the very "ten" events that followed.
DODGEBALL 20 was the first event to be recorded, capturing over a half-hour of footage on that December 30th night. Since then, several other events including 30 and XL, have been visually kept alive thanks mainly to one Dan Spengeman. Live at Ocean Road Park, there is no telling what will happen at this soon-to-be timeless event.
----------------------------------------
-------
A total package!
> Team Warfare: "2 vs. 2" Captains Match!
> Don't worry about being hungry; A.S.K FoodsInc. will take care of that!
> A bit of nostalgia ... ORP, pictures, music, and more
Future Previews
*
> DODGEBALL 50 official theme songs announced
> The statistical entry entitled "Dodgeball DATA"
> Revelation of some possible participants in the "2 vs. 2" captains battle
*
Subject to Change
body_html:
Only one word can send DODGEBALL 50 into immortality: "tradition".

---> OCEAN ROAD PARK
The renown, yet almost hidden ground of Ocean Road Park is set to host the 50th installment of what was first viewed as a "local phenomenon". Ocean Road Park is the birthplace of the very sport expierenced weekly since early September 2005. Some 11 months, 49 events, and 180 players later, the journey reaches its true climax, crashing into the basketball courts that provided months and months of memories.

Quick Facts about ORP
I. Hosted events 1-15, 30, 35, 38, 42, and 43.
II. To this day, holds the record for the highest number of male players at a single event: 36 at DODGEBALL XTWO.
III. Saw the birth and death of Joe Kelly's monumental captains run.


---> THE MUSIC
All previous "ten" events have been accompanied with a special commemorative song ...

- Popular musical group Staind provided their hit "Mudshovel" for the original "ten" event, DODGEBALL X.
- Often referred to as The ClimaXX, DODGEBALL 20 hit the jackpot with "Hey Man, Nice Shot" by Filter.
- The return to Ocean Road Park at DODGEBALL 30 heard "Right Now" by the legendary band Van Halen.
- The DODGEBALL XL theme song had a little "octane" to it with Metallica's "Fuel".

There are thousands upon thousands of songs that would make for great DODGEBALL 50 themes. Don't expect just one song to be the official theme. There will be more on this story in the final week leading to DODGEBALL 50.

---> THE PAGEANTRY
Whether it's the multi-colored streamers or dangling Christmas lights, always expect an additional shine to the "ten" events. If all goes well, the atmosphere at DODGEBALL 50 as a whole will surpass any previous event.

---> AWARDS
Before the action even begins, one can always expect the "Dodgeball Excellence Awards". There have been a mix of awards ranging from the classics like "Powerhouse Thrower" and "Most Intense", to the more comedic "Allied Powers" and "Best Dressed". Either way, the awards portion of past "ten" events have always added a little something to each event.

This time around, although currently unofficial, there will be an award category entitled "The Forgotten Awards". Catch DODGEBALL 50 live to see what these are all about.

---> PICTURES AND VIDEO
As good as the mental pictures may be, cameras have allowed for everyone to get a glimpse of the action. Dating from DODGEBALL 8, still pictures have become almost routine at the very "ten" events that followed.

DODGEBALL 20 was the first event to be recorded, capturing over a half-hour of footage on that December 30th night. Since then, several other events including 30 and XL, have been visually kept alive thanks mainly to one Dan Spengeman. Live at Ocean Road Park, there is no telling what will happen at this soon-to-be timeless event.

-----------------------------------------------

A total package!
> Team Warfare: "2 vs. 2" Captains Match!
> Don't worry about being hungry; A.S.K FoodsInc. will take care of that!
> A bit of nostalgia ... ORP, pictures, music, and more

> The statistical entry entitled "Dodgeball DATA"
